Question: Why is the man holding a virtual scissor in his hand?

Reference Answer: 3

Video ID: 4123808525

Program:

```
ANSWERS0=VIDQA(video=VIDEO,question="Why is the man holding a virtual scissor in his hand?")
ANSWER0=SELECT(question="Why is the man holding a virtual scissor in his hand?",information=ANSWERS0,choices=CHOICES)
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
Rationale:

<hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWERS0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>VIDQA</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>video</span></b>=<img style="vertical-align:middle" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">, <b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>='Why is the man holding a virtual scissor in his hand?')=<b><span style='color: green;'>The man is holding a virtual scissor in his hand to practice cutting hair. This is evident from the fact that he is using a computer screen displaying a virtual image of a head with hair, and he is manipulating a virtual scissor to cut the hair on the screen. The virtual scissor is likely a tool used in a computer program or software designed for practicing hair cutting techniques. Therefore, the correct answer to the question is 'practise cutting hair'. (please judge according to both the answer and the caption below. For the caption, only take explicitly mentioned things as evidence.)
The video features a man in a black shirt standing in front of a computer monitor. He is holding a virtual scissor in his hand, which appears to be part of a computer program or simulation. The man is focused on the monitor, which displays an image of a person with black hair and a red tie. The background shows a room with various objects, including a ladder, boxes, and other equipment. The man seems to be interacting with the virtual scissor, possibly simulating cutting the hair of the person displayed on the monitor. The scene suggests that this could be a demonstration or a test of a virtual reality or augmented reality application.</span></b></div><hr><div><b><span style='color: blue;'>ANSWER0</span></b>=<b><span style='color: red;'>SELECT</span></b>(<b><span style='color: darkorange;'>question</span></b>=Why is the man holding a virtual scissor in his hand?, <b><span style='color: darkorange;'>information</span></b>=["The man is holding a virtual scissor in his hand to practice cutting hair.
